problem: 问题4. 若 $x_1=a>2, x_{n+1}=\frac{x_n^2}{2\left(x_n-1\right)}(n=1,2, \cdots)$, 求 $\left\{x_n\right\}$ 的通项.
solution: 设 $f(x)=\frac{x^2}{2(x-1)}=\frac{1}{1-\left(1-\frac{2}{x}\right)^2}$. 取 $\varphi(x)=1-\frac{2}{x}, g(x)=x^2$, 则 $f(x)=\varphi^{-1}(g(\varphi(x)))$, 于是 $f^{(n)}(x)=\frac{2}{1-\left(1-\frac{2}{x}\right)^{2^n}}$. 取 $x_1=a$, 则 $x_2=f\left(x_1\right), \cdots, x_{n+1}=f\left(x_n\right)=f^{(n)}\left(x_1\right)$, 故 $x_{n+1}=\frac{2}{1-\left(1-\frac{2}{a}\right)^{2^n}}$.
